subject: Negotiation
title: Power Imbalances
description: A fast breakdown of Power Imbalances for builders.

hook.text: When a giant company negotiates with a solo freelancer, the rules aren't the same.

buildup.text: Power imbalances exist in almost every deal â€” size, money, information, or alternatives.

discovery.text: The weaker side can level the field with better preparation and creative alternatives.
